sentences.en: His eyes were blue, his complexion rubicund , his figure almost portly and well-built, his body muscular, and his physical powers fully developed by the exercises of his younger days.
sentences.cn: 蓝色的眼睛，红润的脸色，健壮的身材满是肌肉，充沛的体力完全是年轻时锻炼出来的。

sentences.en: His rubicund face expressed consternation and fatigue.
sentences.cn: 他那红通的脸显得又惊惶又疲乏.

sentences.en: It has many of the same nutrients of the rubicund liquid we love to consume (iron, protein, electrolytes, and caffeine) and has a delectable fruit punch flavor.
sentences.cn: 这种红色液体不仅含有我们喜欢享用的营养素（如铁、蛋白质、电解质和咖啡因），还具有一种怡人的水果鸡尾酒风味。

sentences.en: Passepartout, usually so rubicund, was fairly white with suspense.
sentences.cn: 路路通因为过分激动, 一向红润的面孔都气得发白了.

sentences.en: She watched the colour drain from Colin's rubicund face.
sentences.cn: 她看见科林原本红润的脸渐渐失去了血色。

trans.tran_en: of a reddish colour; ruddy; rosy
